changelog:
SyberiaOS 2.2 Update! 

Minimum firmware requirements: 8.11.15
TWRP Requirements: 3.2.3-2 (Mandatory!)
(If you want to use F2FS check the newer TWRP (3.2.3-5) by AnkitGourav)

Changelog:
[Syberia]
- Launcher3: Add more icon sizes
- Launcher3: Updated Google Feed lib from Pixel 3
- Updated smartbar icon drawables
- Paranoid android PIE navigation
- Edge gestures
- Rearrange gestures settings
- OmniRom QS headers
- Option to hide ADB notification
- ADB over wi-fi
- Pie control, adb tiles
- Enabled MultiUser UI
- Smoother UX
- Fixed QS tiles FC on the first qs page
- Fixed context for tiles without longClick
- Fixed PIP mode
- Fixed NPE in DozeService
- Fixed black screen after screen turned on
- Fixed icon tinting in power detail pages
- Update translations
- Various fixes and improvements

[Whyred]
- Doze is now back! (Battery improvements)
- We have also Xiaomi Dirac implementation! (Thanks to jhenrique09, bgcngm, and all the people who worked on it!)
- Network selection *should* be fixed
- HAL3 is enabled by default now, you dont need to flash any module anymore, also GCam will work out of the box
- Added and enabled perfd! (We are approaching Pixel smoothness)
- Optimized app launch time
- Improved kernel security
- Now you can select HD graphic options in various games (such as PUBG)
- Memory improvements
- Phone now shutdown faster
- Laggyness while expanding notification should now be gone (some user reported sometime ago)
- Various updates and fixes
- Derp 4.6

Download: 
Check OTA, download link in the OP 

Enjoy!
